description:
Have fun losing weight! DietBet is a social dieting game that lets you put your money where your mouth is. 

It's a motivation booster that really works ... 96% of DietBetters lose some weight in 4 weeks and the average winner loses almost 10 lbs and wins $58! 

The rules are simple: whoever loses 4% of their starting weight in 4 weeks splits the pot. (No extra credit for losing the most.) We verify weight loss with photos and algorithmic auditing. 

With our app, you can now take your DietBet with you! Post photos of the pie you didn't eat, brag about the intense spinning class you just took, and tell everyone about your new skinny jeans. Once you experience the thrill of social dieting, you'll never go back to boring diets. Losing weight is now a fun sport. Try it and see for yourself! 

NOTE: you must register at dietbet.com before you can play via the app. 

--- 
Featured in: The Huffington Post, ABC News, CBS News, The Philadelphia Inquirer, The Mercury News, Los Angeles Times, The Wall Street Journal & The New York Times. 

--- 
Quotes from our Players: 
- “Even after my bad day yesterday, I still lost a pound! Guess this is paying off.” – Bree Y., Connecticut 

- “I can feel the money in my pocket!” – Nadia D., Florida 

- “Hope you are all getting as skinny as I am!” – Maggie L., New Jersey 

- “I cannot stop laughing!!!!” – Katie D., New Hampshire 

- “The prize is really feeling better and getting healthier. “ – Leigh W., New York 

- “I love checking the message board, you all are entertaining...I mean, inspiring.” – Jamie, P., Ohio 

- “The good news is that everybody lost weight!” – Sara R., Illinois 

- “Check it out...altogether we have lost 50 pounds so far!” – Katie, M., Michigan 

- “I was just going to go sneak a cupcake in the breakroom (hey - they are mini) but now I've changed my mind!” – Kurt J., California 

- “This is what I needed to get my teenie bopper body back.” - Avery V., Georgia
